summary: This document is a collection of Bureau of Prisons administrative forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 10, 2019. It includes a count sheet, an inmate roster, and multiple official count slips, recording inmate population counts and assignments. The roster lists four inmates with a 'SUICIDE' assignment category, indicating a special watch status.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Administrative count of the inmate population at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, showing a total of 758 inmates. The inmate roster notes four inmates with a 'SUICIDE' assignment.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The document is dated August 10, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody.
An inmate roster lists four inmates with the assignment category 'SUICIDE', indicating they were on suicide watch or special observation.
The total inmate count for the facility was recorded as 758 individuals.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for tracking inmate population and assignments.
